name: resize
description: Fired when the grid is resized. Called with a GridResizeParams object.

name: debouncedResize
description: Fired when the grid is resized with a debounced time of 60ms. Called with a GridResizeParams object.

name: componentError
description: Fired when an exception is thrown in the grid.

name: unmount
description: Fired when the grid is unmounted.

name: cellClick
description: Fired when a cell is clicked. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellDoubleClick
description: Fired when a cell is double-clicked. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellMouseDown
description: Fired when a mousedown event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellMouseUp
description: Fired when a mouseup event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellOver
description: Fired when a mouseover event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellOut
description: Fired when a mouseout event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellEnter
description: Fired when a mouseenter event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellLeave
description: Fired when a mouseleave event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellKeyDown
description: Fired when a keydown event happens in a cell. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellBlur
description: Fired when the blur event of a cell is triggered. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellFocus
description: Fired when a cell gains focus. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellFocusOut
description: Fired when a cell loses focus. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: editCellPropsChange
description: Fired when the props of the edit cell changes. Called with a GridEditCellPropsParams object.

name: cellEditCommit
description: Fired when the props of the edit input are committed. Called with a GridEditCellPropsParams object.

name: cellEditStart
description: Fired when the cell turns to edit mode. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: cellEditStop
description: Fired when the cell turns back to view mode. Called with a GridCellParams object.

name: rowClick
description: Fired when a row is clicked. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: rowDoubleClick
description: Fired when a row is double-clicked. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: rowOver
description: Fired when a mouseover event happens in a row. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: rowOut
description: Fired when a mouseout event happens in a row. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: rowEnter
description: Fired when a mouseenter event happens in a row. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: rowLeave
description: Fired when a mouseleave event happens in a row. Called with a GridRowParams object.

name: editRowsModelChange
description: Fired when the row editing model changes. Called with a GridEditRowModelParams object.

name: columnHeaderKeyDown
description: Fired when a key is pressed in a column header. It's mapped do the keydown DOM event. Called with a GridColumnHeaderParams object.

name: columnHeaderClick
description: Fired when a column header is clicked. Called with a GridColumnHeaderParams object.

name: columnHeaderDoubleClick
description: Fired when a column header is double-clicked. Called with a GridColumnHeaderParams object.

name: selectionChange
description:
Fired when the selection state of one or multiple rows changes.
Called with a GridSelectionModelChangeParams object.

name: pageChange
description: Fired when the page changes.

name: pageSizeChange
description: Fired when the page size changes.

name: rowsScroll
description: Fired during the scroll of the grid viewport. Called with a GridScrollParams object.

name: rowsScrollEnd
description: Fired when scrolling to the bottom of the grid viewport. Called with a GridRowScrollEndParams object.

name: columnResize
description: Fired during the resizing of a column. Called with a GridColumnResizeParams object.

name: columnWidthChange
description: Fired when the width of a column is changed. Called with a GridColumnResizeParams object.

name: columnResizeStart
description: Fired when the user starts resizing a column. Called with an object { field: string }.

name: columnResizeStop
description: Fired when the user stops resizing a column. Called with an object { field: string }.

name: columnOrderChange
description: Fired when the user ends resizing a column.

name: columnsChange
description:
Fired when the columns state is changed.
Called with an array of strings corresponding to the field names.

name: sortModelChange
description:
Fired when the sort model changes.
Called with a GridSortModelParams object.

name: filterModelChange
description:
Fired when the filter model changes.
Called with a GridFilterModel object.

name: stateChange
description: Fired when the state of the grid is updated. Called with a GridStateChangeParams object.

name: columnVisibilityChange
description: Fired when a column visibility changes. Called with a GridColumnVisibilityChangeParams object.
